definitions.body: :Je 50:17 one of a flock, a sheep (or goat) (As. šuju, Ar. 4a0h;un pl. 4a0’un, 4iwa0’un, etc. (also wild ox), cf. Egypt. sau, sheep Bondi:65, cf. Id:Ba NB§ 2 b s);—abs. [[שֶׂה]] Ge 30:32 +, cstr. [[שֵׂה]] Is 43:23 +; sf. [[שֵׂיוֹ]] De 22:1, [[שְׂיֵ֫הוּ]] 1Sa 14:34; not in pl.;—

a sheep, or goat, nom. unit. of [[חאׁן]]: as property Ge 32:32, Ge 32:32 (J; + [[עאׁן]] coll., [[כְּשָׂבִים]], [[עִזִּים]]), Ex 21:37, Ex 21:37 (+ [[שׁוֹר]], [[חאׁן]] coll.), Ex 22:3 (+ [[שׁוֹר]], [[חֲמוֹר]], v:Ex 22:8 (id.), v:Ex 22:9 (id; all E); De 22:1 (+ [[שׁוֹר]]), 1Sa 17:34 ([[זה]] Kt van d. H. erron., v. Baer Dr), roaming pasture Is 7:25, straying Ps 119:176 (sim.), slaughtered Is 53:7 (in sim.); + [[שׁוֹר]], [[חֲמוֹר]] Ju Jdg 6:4, 1Sa 22:19, Jos 6:21 (J), + id. + [[גׇּמָל]] 1Sa 15:3; as sacrifice Ge 22:7, Ge 22:8 (J), Ex 13:13, Le 5:12, Le 12:8, Nu 15:11 ([[בַּכְּבָשִׂים אוֹ בָּעִזִּים]] ´[[שׂ]]:; all P), De 18:3 (+ [[שׁוֹר]]), Is 43:23, Is 66:3 (+ [[שׁוֹר]]), [[מִן־הַצּאׁן]] Ez Eze 45:15; cf. Ex 34:19 (+ [[שׁוֹר]]), v:Ex 34:20 (J), Le 27:26 (P; + [[שׁוֹר]]); fit for sacrifice Le 22:28 (H); unfit Vulgate:23 (H), De 17:1 (both + [[שׁוֹר]]); as food 1Sa 14:34 (+ [[שׁוֹר]]), ´[[כְּשָׂבִים וְשׂ]] :´[[עִזִּים שׂ]]: De 14:4 (+ id.); for Passover Ex 12:3, Ex 12:3, Ex 12:4, Ex 12:4, Ex 12:5 (P); fig. of Isr. Ez Eze 34:17, Eze 34:17 (‖, [[עַתּוּדִים]]), v:Eze 34:20, v:Eze 34:20, v:Eze 34:22, v:Eze 34:22.
coll. flock: [[שֶׂה פְזוּרָה]] Je 50:17 (= [[חאׁן אׂבְדוֹת]] v:Je 50:6).
